title: Ikonei Island: OST
description: Original Videogame Soundtrack from "Ikonei Island: An Earthlock Adventure" by Theo Nogueira.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Ikonei Island: an Earthlock Adventure” invites you to embark on a heartwarming multiplayer co-op journey suitable for all ages. Dive into gardening, form delightful bonds with fantastical creatures, undertake daring infiltrations of pirate camps, and much more. The captivating soundtrack, crafted by the composer Theo Nogueira, ventures into a sonic realm that spans from the orchestral odyssey of “From Shore to Cliff,” recorded with the renowned Kringkastingsorkesteret KORK (Norwegian Radio Orchestra), to the spirited flamenco-inspired tune “Don’t Cross the Longhorn”, and even a playful and jazzy, almost comical composition for “There Goes the Axepecker”. The album also counts with the collaboration with the songwriter and artist Patty Gurdy, who wrote and performed “Piratehog Chant”, a bold and fun song that will make you want to dance to its beat. This musical diversity breathes life into the Island, offering a fresh and unique experience. While the original soundtrack predominantly operates procedurally and systemically, this album assembles those smaller pieces into cohesive tracks that will immerse you and transport you into the Ikonei’s Heartland.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Credits
<!--text-->
Soundtrack Composed by Theo Nogueira - Piratehog Chant and Piratehog Camp Tracks by Patty Gurdy - “Ikonei Island: an Earthlock Adventure” by Snowcastle Games - Game Published by Jet Pack Collective and Iterative Collective - Kringkastingsorkesteret (KORK Orchestra) - Ingar Bergby (Conductor) - Espen Ramsli Fredriksen (Orchestra Producer) João Paulo Drumond (Percussion) - Mike Fonte (Guitars) - Ayran Nicodemo (Violin) - Damian Bolotin (Violin) - Bruno Migliari (Contrabass) - Josh Plotner (Woodwinds) - Jon-Paul Frappier (Trumpet) - Adam Alesi (Drums) - Chris Ott (Trombone) - Ben Trigg (Violoncello)
